snippet.title: Brooks Running Shoes Hit Their Stride
snippet.description: Brooks Sports tried to go toe-to-toe with Nike across all sports, but couldn't keep pace. A renewed focus on performance running shoes helped the company take off. The subsidiary of Berkshire Hathaway is "on fire" says Warren Buffett. read »

snippet.title: Running Shoes 2.0 - Can Swiss Technology Make You Faster, Reduce Injuries?
snippet.description: Running shoes have changed a lot in recent years, but this is much different. read »

snippet.title: Skechers Proves We Need Clinical Trials Of Running Shoes
snippet.description: Skechers will pay $40 million to settle allegations by the Federal Trade Commission that its adds deceived consumers about the health benefits of "Shape-Ups" shoes. read »

snippet.title: DSW Shoes Running Strong, Shares Catching Up To Yearly High
snippet.description: This footwear retailer rebounded sharply from a short-term low to move back within striking distance of its all-time high. read »

snippet.title: The 3 Best Running Routes In San Antonio
snippet.description: SAN ANTONIO, Texas – Three routes, three distances, three ways to see the big Texas town flash before your very eyes. read »

snippet.title: Money2020: A Duck Dynasty Running Shoe? TV And Crowdfunding Intersect On A&E
snippet.description: Spira’s springloaded shoes campaign raised $42,700 in 2012. On A&E and RocketHub’s Project Startup they’ve raised $317,000 in 2013 so far. Spira has experienced record success wtih the help of RocketHub and A&E. I had the opportunity this week to moderate a panel at the second annual Money2020 trade show event [...]

snippet.title: Spira Footwear To Introduce Duck Dynasty Running Shoe
snippet.description: Fans of Duck Dynasty, cable networks #1 nonfiction show, are about to be “Happy, Happy, Happy” with news that the series is getting its own line of sneakers thanks to Spira Footwear. The shoe will feature Spira's patented WaveSpring Technology in combination with the show's famous duck camouflage pattern, and will first go [...] read »

snippet.title: Running The Numbers: What's The Real Cost Of Your Workout?
snippet.description: Meet the woman who does yoga three times a week—for six cents a workout. And the guy who pays $15,000 a year to stay in shape. read »

snippet.title: Springblade Is adidas' Single Most Important Running Shoe
snippet.description: VideoThe Springblade shoe may be the single most important thing that adidas Running has ever done. Photo courtesy of adidas. Springblade is a shoe that features 16 individually tuned blades that move runners forward. And it is a shoe that adidas believes will be its connection to consumers for the foreseeable [...] read »

snippet.title: Your Phone And Shoes Deserve A Social Graph, Too
snippet.description: A Silicon Valley startup, Leap Commerce, is building a shopper's version of the "social graph," in which shoes, smartphones and other goods take center stage, rather than the usual assortment of our friends. read »
